enableDynamicLabels.name: New label input for flags
enableDynamicLabels.description: Enables a new, more interactive way to add and remove labels from a flag while editing, or making a new flag.

enableModalFlagDeletes.name: Single page flag delete
enableModalFlagDeletes.description: Enabled a modal for the deleting process of a flag, instead of directing the user to another page.

enableTabbedFlagEdit.name: Flag view now has an edit tab
enableTabbedFlagEdit.description: Removes the dark grey information area under the title of a flag, and replaces it with a sidetab that gives access to an edit form for the flag, along with advanced information about the flag.

enableRequests.name: Request and invite managment
enableRequests.description: Enables pages for requesting an invite while the site is in a closed beta or alpha, and adds an admin tab for managing the requests.

enableRegistration.name: Enable registration for everyone
enableRegistration.description: Enables the registration page for the site, useful only if enableRequests is turned off (value set to false).
